description: Provides data on investment commercial credit exposure for IBRD and IDA. The values are shown net of collateral held. For IBRD, the decrease in credit exposure in FY2010 reflects a decrease in the size of the IBRD investment program due to decrease in liquidity held and a relatively smaller decrease in IBRD's net swap exposure.

name: Commercial Credit Exposure by Counterparty Rating
